segments.text: Every year , the South has the floods . It is an act of God .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , you have some other ideas ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think , in some way it is an act of God , but in another way , it just is caused by us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We didn't pay attention to the environment , cut down trees and polluted the air .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . Fortunately government has taken some action to prevent such things .
segments.speaker: S1
